title: (x) Exquisite Leather & Luggage - Coronet, ITC Zapf Chancery{Grant}
content: I apologize if this is an easy one, but I have a terrible time with scripts... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110135603im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23103.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content:
The capitals and the ampersand are [Coronet Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110135603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/coronet-rr/bold/testdrive.html?s=Exquisite%20Leather%20%26&p=48), while the lowercase is [Zapf Chancery Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110135603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-zapf-chancery/medium-italic/testdrive.html?s=Exquisite%20Leather%20%26&p=48).   
   
Strangely enough, they work reasonably well together. Hmmm.
